page.title: 11ST.BREWARD CHURCH
page.content:
{ST.BREWARD CHURCH}IS PROBABLY THE {HIGHEST CHURCH}IN CORNWALL.IT WAS FOUNDED BY A PERSON CALLED ST.BRUERE IN 1189,1189 WAS THE TIME THEY STARTED BUILDING BUT THEY DID'NT FINISH UNTIL ABOUT 1205.THE NORTH AISLE WAS BUILT FIRST AND THE SECOND AISLE WAS ADDED IN THE THIRTEENTH CENTURY.THERE IS A PEW CALLED THE HAMATETHY PEW,THE FRONT OF WHICH WAS MADE OF OAK AND OAK MADE A GOOD MATERIAL TO SHARPEN SWORDS ON.DURING THE CIVIL WAR SOME SOLDIERS HELPED TO PROVE THE THEORY BY GOING INTO THE CHURCH AT NIGHT AND SLASHING THEIR SWORDS AT IT AND WRECKED IT.SOME PEOPLE THINK THAT ST.BRUERE WAS BURIED UNDER SOME STONES IN THE CHURCH BUT OTHERS DO NOT REALLY BELIEVE IT.
{SEE ALSO PAGE 12 FOR DETAILS OF NEWLY {BUILT ALTAR. }
